doc.after: A tailhook arresting hook or arrester hook is a device attached to the empennage rear of some military fixed wing aircraft The hook is used to achieve rapid deceleration during routine landings aboard aircraft carrier flight decks at sea or during emergency landings or aborted takeoffs at properly equipped airports
